forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this morning, the sun peeks through a canvas of clear skies, casting a gentle glow over the city. As the day unfolds, temperatures will reach a comfortable 64 degrees before settling to a cooler 62 in the afternoon. With a soft west-southwest breeze whispering through at 7 to 15 mph and occasional gusts nudging up to 22, the air carries a refreshing crispness that invigorates yet does not overwhelm. Tonight, as dusk unfolds, expect a gentle transition to partly cloudy skies with temperatures dipping to around 52, offering a cool embrace as the evening sets in.

The clarity of the day is remarkable, perhaps inviting a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero where the bay offers its shimmering allure. For those inclined to take a moment with a book, a cozy café patio might serve as the perfect spot, the fresh air mingling with the aroma of coffee. Light layers will be your trusted companions—perhaps a light sweater or jacket for the cooler moments, and comfortably breathable fabrics to enjoy the warmth without feeling constrained. In a city that reverberates with life, today holds the promise of simple joys, whether you choose to wander through parks or engage in the quiet reflection that these mild, sunlit hours bring.
